EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in August 2014
EmailTemplate.name: 15-27 October Uniform Shop Closed Rosinka
EmailTemplate.subject: 15-27 October Uniform Shop Closed Rosinka
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,
We would like to inform you that the uniform shop will be closed tomorrow, 15th October until the 27th, due to inventory.
It will open again on Tuesday the 28th, operating with normal hours, from 8:30am - 4:30pm.
We apologise for the short notice. Thank you.
Kind Regards,
Rosinka Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
